title: Ekko: Seconds, teaser music on League of Legend's Soundcloud
body: Last I remember a Rioter stated that both Ekko's login and his teaser reveal music would be on their Soundcloud. Currently, only his login music is on there. I get that he just came out and stuff, but I'm hoping Riot doesn't/haven't forgotten to put the teaser remix version online as well.

replies.body: They're both up on soundcloud now :)
Please [link to the soundcloud](https://soundcloud.com/leagueoflegends) when you mention it in a thread that lacks a link
Gracias, we were expecting it a lot ! Nice work ! :)
